product_name: Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Garment Folder - Medium
long_description: Keep pressed shirts and slacks looking sharp using the Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Garment Folder in medium. Integrated stretch side wings compress clothes compactly to free up more room. Compress Wings(TM) on each side offer stretch compression to keep garments from shifting. Folder minimizes clothing wrinkles. Includes helpful lightweight folding board with instructions printed on it. Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Garment Folder in medium has a grab handle and fits into most carry-on luggage. Medium size measures 18 in. x 12 in.
short_description: Keep pressed shirts and slacks looking sharp using the Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Garment Folder in medium. Integrated stretch side wings compress clothes compactly to free up more room.
